definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: Well, we ended up walloping them. We took every weight class.
sentences.chinese: 所以我們最終大敗他們，贏得了所有重量級的比賽。

sentences.english: Zeng Fanzhi is undoubtedly one of the most important Chinese contemporary artists to date.
sentences.chinese: 曾梵志無疑是中國當代最重量級的畫家之一。

sentences.english: Classes seem without enough weight, consisting of only a few members.
sentences.chinese: 類顯得不夠重量級，僅僅包含屈指可數的幾個成員。

sentences.english: The heavyweight danced around the ring like a lightweight.
sentences.chinese: 重量級選手像輕量級選手一樣在拳擊場上跳躍。

sentences.english: However, at least one big signing - with a new striker looking the most pressing need for Ferguson - was expected.
sentences.chinese: 不過，弗格森依然期望着能夠簽下一名重量級的前鋒。

sentences.english: Another, Leung Chun-ying, is a force in the property world.
sentences.chinese: 另外一個，梁振英，他是房地產領域的重量級人物。

sentences.english: Out of question, she is a heavy -weight politician.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，她是個重量級的政客。

sentences.english: He had been a heavyweight prize-fighter.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個重量級的拳擊手。

sentences.english: His credits include blockbuster films Gen- X Cops and The Medallion.
sentences.chinese: 他的作品包括重量級作品根X警察和獎章。

sentences.english: This week, a number of heavyweight has left more nail-biter was to Yahoo.
sentences.chinese: 本週，若干重量級人物先後離開，更使雅虎元氣大傷。

sentences.english: But in recent years it has punched far above its weight.
sentences.chinese: 但是近年來，韓國頻頻打出遠超其重量級的重拳。

sentences.english: Mediations on the other hand are a more "heavyweight" technology option.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，中介是較爲“重量級”的技術選項。

sentences.english: He had been a heavyweight prize-fighter .
sentences.chinese: 他曾經是重量級職業拳擊手。

sentences.english: Disclosure matters, the three "heavyweights" have come forward to explain.
sentences.chinese: 事情披露後，三位“重量級人物”紛紛出面解釋。

sentences.english: No heavyweight combined the two assets so formidably.
sentences.chinese: 從未有重量級拳手可以如此完美地將兩者結合在一起。
當地重量級的人物專注地傾聽。

definition: currently popular (of movie stars, singers etc)
peak/apex/world best/number one/finest (competitors)/top (figures in a certain field)
legendary/fantasy saga/romance/short stories of the Tang and Song Dynasty
troop arrangement/battle formation/lineup (of a sports team etc)
